document_data.caption: A map showing Mamnu Island offshore of the Pearl Cities region.
document_data.name: Mamnu Island
document_data.mainbody: '''Mamnu Island''' was a large rocky island within the [[Great Sea]] off the coast of [[west Zakhara]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2bSWIc}}
document_data.Geography: Mamnu Island was located off the southwest coast of the [[Pearl Cities]] region of Zakhara. The island was separated from [[Al-Suqut Mountains]], that run up the coast of the mainland in this region, by a narrow stretch of sea just a few miles wide. Mamnu Island was {{SI|150|mi|k|long=yes}} long and {{SI|40|mi|k|long=yes}} wide. An unnamed mountain range dominated the central spine of the island, while rocky beaches formed along the shore. The island was uninhabited as of [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
